CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Verdant Ward relative to Azure Enclave?
SRP.A: Verdant Ward is {below} Azure Enclave in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Enclave relative to Outer Rim Settlements?
SRP.A: Azure Enclave is {below} Outer Rim Settlements in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Azure Enclave relative to Crimson Quarter?
SRP.A: Azure Enclave is {above} Crimson Quarter in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Outer Rim Settlements}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total life expectancy?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Quarter}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Verdant Ward's maximum Life Expectancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Verdant Ward's maximum Life Expectancy is in {2000}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Azure Enclave's minimum Life Expectancy in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Azure Enclave's minimum Life Expectancy is in {1984}.

NC.Q: Between 1993 and 2002, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1988 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1993 and 2002 was {smaller} than between 1988 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1997 and 2006, was the average total Life Expectancy higher or lower than between 1985 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total life expectancy between 1997 and 2006 was {higher} than between 1985 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1986 and 1988, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1987 and 2004?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1986 and 1988 was {smaller} than between 1987 and 2004.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 2000, did the total Life Expectancy experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total life expectancy between 1988 and 2000 was {larger} than between 1986 and 1989.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Outer Rim Settlements} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Crimson Quarter and Outer Rim Settlements first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Crimson Quarter and Outer Rim Settlements first exchanged leading positions in {1985}.
